item.title: SEAM: Behind the Paper
item.description:
image: “uploads/seam_logo_light.png”

“Coming soon: reflections on the method behind SEAM, what surprised me, and what I’d do next.”

This post will explore some of the insights and design decisions that went into developing SEAM — an interpretability framework for understanding how mutations reshape regulatory mechanisms in genomic deep learning models.

For now, you can read more about the method on GitHub or check out the ICLR GEM Workshop abstract.
